name: MetabolicSyndromeDiagnosisSCT
title: Metabolic Syndrome Diagnosis SCT
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: Metabolic syndrome may be diagnosed if a patient has three or more of the following conditions:

A large waistline,
High blood pressure,
High blood sugar levels,
High blood triglycerides, or
Low HDL cholesterol.
Metabolic syndrome is common in the United States. About 1 in 3 adults have metabolic syndrome.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a diagnosis of metabolic syndrome.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes the SNOMED CT metabolic syndrome diagnosis concepts.),(Exclusion Criteria: None)
